text.0: The Governor of Ebonyi State, Dave Umahi, recently claimed that 11.5million Igbos are living in northern Nigeria and that 3 million Igbo people of voting age reside in Lagos but there is no data to support these claims. Read the facts here: https://t.co/vX5dDT5Dn4 #DubawaChecks
text.1:
A twitter user shared a viral claim that President Buhari visited Kankara, a town in Katsina State where hundreds of secondary school students were kidnapped, two days after the incident. However, there is no evidence to back up this claim. 
https://t.co/z4I9vP5lvo #DubawaChecks
text.2: We ran a research to examine fact checks on claims around #EndSARS protests in Nigeria. It revealed the extent of disinformation and misinformation during and after the protests. Read the research here: https://t.co/lxxywUmxUv #DubawaChecks
text.3: The viral claim that INEC presiding officers made confessions about the electronic transmission of 2019 presidential election results is true, however, the report is from April 2019. Read the facts here: https://t.co/36OVo9yMWY #DubawaChecks
